title: DC by Lag in Champ select
body: I receive sometimes the message, "Trying to reconnect you to league of legends." and it gives the option to either exit or try to reconnect, by the time it reconnects, if it does, I'm already booted out of the champ select. Then I get hit with a dodge timer. This is ridiculous. I do not have any control over this, yet a potential ban could be coming my way if this were to happen consistently. This needs to be addressed and fixed. There are on and off days with my internet, I should not get penalized for something I cannot control, especially when it shoots up a message _giving me the option to exit_.

replies.body:
It really sucks when your ISP gets in the way of your gaming -_-'...

Even though you didn't intentionally leave the match those other team members were still left to try and 4v5 while you weren't there, which could have made the difference in whether your team won or lost. I can try to help you find some ways to make sure you're able to stay in those matches though! We can try running a hardwired connection to see if that's a little more stable, but go ahead and check out the other steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) while you're at it.
